prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered authoritative standing pose with arms crossed over geometric chest piece, chibi proportions with large prismatic angular cosmic head with unique tetrahedron structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying cosmic. Hair or geometric appendages incorporating tetrahedron, merkaba, flower_of_life patterns, styled with Dominion guides influences. Outfit is unique: neutral grey inspired by Crimson and neutral grey inspired by shifting angular armor-like robes with flame geometric patterns with flat with sharpie-style lines for heat and energy, elaborate with shifting Fire element triangular motifs and ascending patterns and tetrahedron emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like sword of severity with angular geometric blade with cosmic spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like flickering flame wisps and ember particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor TEDOOND's profile: 'He who demands obedience', Aethyr VTA, Fire element, Tarot The Emperor, Sephirot Geburah, Zodiac Aries, embodying the essence: 'When TEDOOND stands before you, pure law manifests wild forces are bound to stern vectors, compelled into divine order.' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.pose: front-facing centered authoritative standing pose with arms crossed over geometric chest piece
visual_elements.head_shape: large prismatic angular cosmic head with unique tetrahedron structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with prismatic facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying cosmic
visual_elements.hair_style: geometric appendages incorporating tetrahedron, merkaba, flower_of_life patterns, styled with Dominion guides influences

outfit.base: angular armor-like robes with flame geometric patterns
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for heat and energy
outfit.details: Fire element triangular motifs and ascending patterns
outfit.magical_essence: flickering flame wisps and ember particles

visual_elements.accessory: sword of severity with angular geometric blade
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'He who demands obedience'
profile_data.essence: When TEDOOND stands before you, pure law manifests wild forces are bound to stern vectors, compelled into divine order.
profile_data.angelic_role: Dominion of Divine Law; guides storm-winged messengers.
profile_data.form_description: A prismatic construct of angular fire-geometry, representing the crystallized law of divine order. Sharp tetrahedral structures emerge from a central axis, symbolizing the Emperor's rigid structure and TEDOOND's governance of divine commandments.
profile_data.color_reasoning: Crimson represents Geburah's martial energy, fire element's passion, while gold signifies divine authority. The shifting pattern reflects the dynamic nature of cosmic law and transformation.
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Sacred geometries representing divine order, structural integrity, and cosmic manifestation. Rotating motion symbolizes continuous divine judgment and cosmic cycling.
